databaseaccess.interfaces

Interface IVideoDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MockUpDAO, VideoDao

    public interface IVideoDao
    Database access object for videos.
    Author:
    Jorsi Grammens

             Video video)
      throws ClassicDatabaseException,
             ClassicNotFoundException
